technology: There was a brief moment of the video freezing, but overall the technology was fine.
cur_neg_affect: The participant did not express much negative affect, but did mention that she was not eager to get the vaccine because she hates needles.
past_neg_affect: The participant mentioned that she stayed in the dorms longer than everyone else, which looking back on it was probably not a good decision.
communal_orientation: The participant was friendly and engaged in the conversation, but did not go out of her way to build off of the conversation partner's story.
engagement: The participant was engaged in the conversation and shared her experiences, but did not ask many questions of her partner.
defensiveness: The participant was not at all defensive in justifying her beliefs/perspective.
vaccine_importance: The participant believes in the power of vaccines, but is not eager to get them because she hates needles.
booster_importance: The participant is not sure if she would get the booster, and would need to do more research.
cognitive_complexity: The participant demonstrated a moderate amount of cognitive complexity by considering the pros and cons of getting the vaccine.
general_notes: The participant has a fear of needles.
